auth.name: Name
auth.biometricUnavailable: Biometrics not available or no saved credentials.
auth.resetEmailMessage: Check your inbox. We've sent a link to reset your password.

home.title: Your service requests
home.emptySubtext: Publish your first request and receive proposals from qualified professionals.

newRequest.title: New service request
newRequest.subtitle: Describe the service you need and receive quotes from qualified professionals
newRequest.categoryHint: Select one or more categories that best describe the required service
newRequest.fillFields: Please fill in the following fields: {{fields}}
newRequest.invalidSession: Invalid session. Please sign in again.
newRequest.createdOffline: Request created offline. It will be synced when connection is restored.
newRequest.noCostInfo: There is no cost to request quotes. Interested professionals will contact you.

requestDetail.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this request? This action cannot be undone.

buyCredits.title: Buy Credits
buyCredits.subtitle: Use credits to unlock leads and send proposals
buyCredits.howItWorksText:
‚Ä¢ Each lead has a cost in credits
‚Ä¢ Cost varies by category and demand
‚Ä¢ Secure payment with card or digital wallet

sendProposal.title: Send proposal
sendProposal.subtitle: Present your quote to the client. Contact will be made directly between you after sending.
sendProposal.invalidPrice: Please provide a valid value greater than zero
sendProposal.requestNotFound: Request not found or already removed.
sendProposal.requestNotAccepting: This request no longer accepts new proposals.

settings.title: Settings
settings.darkModeDescription: Switches the interface to dark tones. The application will follow the system automatically, but can be adjusted manually here.

register.title: Create Account
register.mainLocationSubtitleProfessional: Provide the district where you are located. Use autocomplete to select the district.
register.mainLocationSubtitleClient: Provide where you are located. Use autocomplete to select parish, municipality and district.
register.serviceRegionsSubtitle: Add the districts where you will serve. You can provide multiple districts.
register.servicesSubtitle: Select at least one category you work in.
register.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
register.fillFields: Please fill in the following fields: {{fields}}
register.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
register.invalidSelectionDistrict: Invalid selection. Choose the district again.
register.invalidSelectionParish: Invalid selection. Choose the parish again.
register.addAtLeastOneRegion: Add at least one service district.
register.fillProfessionalData: Fill in the required professional data.
register.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy to continue.
register.mustAcceptTermsError: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy.
register.selectDistrictAndAdd: Select a district and then click add.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.expired: This password reset link has expired. Links expire after 1 hour. Please request a new link.
resetPassword.invalidOrUsed: This password reset link is invalid or has already been used. Please request a new link.
resetPassword.invalidOrExpiredGeneric: Invalid or expired reset link. Please request a new link.
resetPassword.fillFields: Please fill in the following fields: {{fields}}
resetPassword.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
resetPassword.passwordChangedMessage: Your password has been changed successfully. You can sign in now.
resetPassword.changePasswordError: Error changing password. Please try again.
resetPassword.processingError: Error processing reset link. Please try again.
resetPassword.requestNewLink: Please request a new password recovery link.

editRequest.title: Edit Service Request
editRequest.subtitle: Update your request information
editRequest.serviceTitlePlaceholder: E.g.: Living room and bedroom painting
editRequest.categoriesSubtitle: Select one or more categories that best describe the required service
editRequest.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the service in detail: what you need, when, special requirements, etc.
editRequest.locationCaption: Select district, municipality and parish of the service.
editRequest.photosSubtitle: Add or remove images to help professionals better understand the service.
editRequest.cannotEditReason: This request cannot be edited. Only pending requests without accepted proposals can be edited.
editRequest.fillFields: Please fill in the following fields: {{fields}}
editRequest.invalidSession: Invalid session. Please sign in again.
editRequest.editWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Only pending requests without accepted proposals can be edited.

landing.title: We connect clients with trusted professionals
landing.subtitle: Request a service at no cost or unlock new leads for your business. Elastiquality brings together those who need help with those who know how to do it.
landing.helperText: Available on Web, Android and iOS. It's free to request quotes.
landing.creditPlansSubtitle: Buy credits and unlock qualified contacts. Each lead shows the cost before unlocking.
landing.readyToStartSubtitle: Clients request at no cost. Professionals unlock leads and increase their service schedule.
landing.footerText: Portuguese marketplace connecting clients with local professionals.

clientSteps.step1Text: Provide category, location, details and photos to explain what you need.
clientSteps.step2Text: Evaluated professionals send quotes and you compare values, deadlines and reputation.
clientSteps.step3Text: Chat or call, negotiate and arrange the service with complete freedom.

professionalSteps.step1Text: Choose categories, service regions and build your portfolio.
professionalSteps.step2Text: Purchase credits with credit card or digital wallet to unlock contacts.
professionalSteps.step3Text: See qualified leads, unlock those that interest you and send proposals.

features.qualifiedLeadsText: We use filters by category, location and demand to deliver opportunities aligned with your profile.
features.transparentReputationText: Reviews, history and portfolio help clients decide with more confidence and highlight good professionals.
features.realTimeManagementText: Track leads, proposals and expenses in a complete dashboard, with alerts via app, email and push.

packages.basicDescription: Ideal for starting to attract new clients (10% discount).
packages.premiumDescription: Best value for money with 20% discount.
packages.payAsYouGoDescription: Buy credits according to your business demand.
packages.expiryInfo: Credits expire in 3 months. Payment by card, Apple Pay or Google Pay.

help.title: Help Centre
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions
help.faq1Text: Tap "Create Account" on the sign in screen and fill in your details.
help.faq2Text: On the home screen, tap the "+" button and fill in the details of the service you need.
help.faq3Text: Professionals can buy credits in the "Buy Credits" section of the menu.
help.clientGuideDesc: Learn how to use the platform as a client
help.professionalGuideDesc: Learn how to use the platform as a professional

edit.title: Edit Profile
edit.name: Full name
edit.permissionMessage: We need access to your photos to allow upload. Check permissions in device settings.
edit.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

review.title: Review professional
review.subtitle: Tell us about your experience with
review.subtitleEnd: . Your review helps other clients decide who to work with.
review.commentPlaceholder: Describe what you liked most or something that could be improved.
review.invalidSession: Invalid session. Please sign in again.
review.selectRatingError: Please select a rating between 1 and 5 stars.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Adjust the types of alerts you would like to receive. You can change these preferences at any time.
notifications.messagesDesc: Receive alerts when you receive messages in chat
notifications.leadsDesc: Receive alerts when new leads are available
notifications.proposalsDesc: Receive alerts when you receive new proposals

list.title: Conversations
list.emptySubtext: Your conversations with professionals will appear here.

conversation.title: Chat
conversation.permissionMessage: We need access to your photos to send images in chat. Enable permission in settings.
conversation.startSubtitle: Send the first message to align service details.

transactionHistory.title: Transaction History
transactionHistory.emptySubtext: View all purchases and debit/credit movements associated with your professional account.

success.title: Payment completed!
success.description: Your payment has been confirmed. Credits will be updated automatically shortly.

cancelled.title: Payment cancelled
cancelled.description: The purchase was cancelled. You can try again at any time.

dashboard.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to sign out? You can sign back in whenever you want.
